text: Leonard Joseph "Len" Cariou (born September 30, 1939) is a Canadian actor. Cariou is best known for his role of Sweeney Todd in the original cast of Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, which earned him a Tony Award for Best Actor in a Musical and a Drama Desk Award in 1979. He now plays Henry Reagan, NYPD Police Commissioner (retired), in the multi-generational television series Blue Bloods on CBS. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Len Cariou at the Internet Off-Broadway Database Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian singers Category:Actors from Manitoba
title: Len Cariou
